pr_title: look for versioned python interpreters (e.g. pythonx.y) on PATH

timeline.message: look for versioned python interpreters (e.g. pythonx.y) on PATH

timeline.bodyText: Is this related to this PR, or just a bit of UI fit and finish?
timeline.author: gtritchie

replies.bodyText: Related to the PR, in that I saw that after letting more rows enter the UI it became overly tall, and so constraining the height helped it feel more natural here.
replies.author: kevinushey
